message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a valuable product. I believe you'll find it to be a great investment. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. I would like to propose a price of $750000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $825000. This is the best price I can offer at this time.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate the effort. I would like to counter with an offer of $800000 for the product. I hope this meets within your acceptable range.
